post.subject: Light Cone Event Warp: "Brilliant Fixation" & "Bygone Reminiscence"
post.structured_content:
[{"insert":"
"},{"insert":{"image":"https://upload-os-bbs.hoyolab.com/upload/2024/09/27/fb340f6e488acb9c6d0a5bb8765a4564_1680285139656833697.jpg"},"attributes":{"align":"img-center","height":1080,"width":1920,"size":"257524"}},{"insert":"
Hello, Trailblazers!
Light Cone Event Warp Period for this phase is 2024/10/02 12:00:00 – 2024/10/22 15:00:00 (server time), and includes the following content:

▌Light Cone Event Warp: "Brilliant Fixation""},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star Light Cone "Scent Alone Stays True (Abundance)" and 4-star Light Cones "Shadowed by Night (The Hunt)," "Shared Feeling (Abundance)," and "Planetary Rendezvous (Harmony)" will be boosted.

■Event Period
2024/10/02 12:00:00 – 2024/10/22 15:00:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Light Cones
Scent Alone Stays True (Abundance)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Light Cones
Shadowed by Night (The Hunt)
Shared Feeling (Abundance)
Planetary Rendezvous (Harmony)

▌Light Cone Event Warp: "Bygone Reminiscence""},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star Light Cone "Worrisome, Blissful (The Hunt)" and 4-star Light Cones "Shadowed by Night (The Hunt)," "Shared Feeling (Abundance)," and "Planetary Rendezvous (Harmony)" will be boosted.

■Event Period
2024/10/02 12:00:00 – 2024/10/22 15:00:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Light Cones
Worrisome, Blissful (The Hunt)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Light Cones
Shadowed by Night (The Hunt)
Shared Feeling (Abundance)
Planetary Rendezvous (Harmony)

※ Among the above Light Cones, the limited Light Cone will not become available in the Stellar Warp event.
※ During the event, the limited 5-star Light Cone "Scent Alone Stays True (Abundance)" can only be obtained from the Light Cone Event Warp "Brilliant Fixation," while the limited 5-star Light Cone "Worrisome, Blissful (The Hunt)" can only be obtained from the Light Cone Event Warp "Bygone Reminiscence."
※ This event is considered a Light Cone Event Warp. The cumulative Warp count for a guaranteed 5-star Light Cone in any Light Cone Event Warp will always be carried over to other Light Cone Event Warps, but is independent of and unaffected by other types of Warps.
※ The 4-star Light Cone "Shadowed by Night (The Hunt)" will become available in Stellar Warp in Version 2.6, but will not be available in Departure Warp.
※ For more information, please head to the Warp screen.
"}]
